name: Polar Ice
description:
Traverse the arctic as a polar bear. Hunt for seals, avoid drowning, and you might just reach your family.

Created by some of Falling Cat Studios in 48 hours as part of the Spring 2016 UW-Stout IGDA Club 48 Hour Game Jam:

Programming - Bob Vogt, Keenan Barber, Shane Yach

Art - April Lewer, Keenan Barber, Bronson Bero

Sound - Shane Yach

Emotional Support - Kayla Boyd
